content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Let's discuss the price. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. So, I was thinking about 350 euros per month. That would be a great help for me.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my expectations. The location and the quality of the apartment justify a higher price. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can increase my offer a bit. How about 400 euros per month? I think that should be a good balance between my budget and the quality of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hmm, 400 euros is still quite low for the area. The city center is usually more expensive. Are you sure you can't go higher? I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable. I can go a little higher. How about 450 euros per month? That is the highest I can go without stretching my budget too much.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your effort, but 450 euros is still not sufficient for the apartment's location and amenities. I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that offer. Would you be willing to reconsider?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. I think 450 euros is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I can't really go higher than that. If you don't agree, I understand. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have different opinions on the value of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your perspective, but as a landlord, I must ensure that the rent reflects the market value and the investment I've made in the property. Since we cannot agree on a price, I'm afraid I must terminate the negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
